name: Pongo (itch) (JakeLunn, Bradgnar, autech, cbollin)
description:
Pongo is a short-story game about a child and a dog named Pongo. Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Developers: Brad Peterman, Cassidy Bollin, Jake Lunn

Music By: Uun (https://soundcloud.com/uun)

--

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to Move
  • F to Interact
